description:
Turn cold data into booked meetings with UK business owners.
You're not pitching fluff — you're opening doors for solar companies doing real business.
Your Target:

2–4 qualified meetings booked per day.
No recycled leads. No easy wins. Just straight-up outbound.

questions.question: Can you walk me through your experience in turning cold data into booked meetings with UK business owners for solar companies?
How do you ensure that you meet the target of 2–4 qualified meetings booked per day while working with outbound leads?
Give me an example of a challenging outbound lead you worked on. How did you handle it, and what was the outcome?
Describe a time when you successfully opened doors for a solar company with a UK business owner. What strategies did you use?
How do you prioritize your outreach efforts when dealing with a large pool of potential leads?
Tell me about a time when you had to handle rejection or objections while prospecting. How did you overcome it?
What tools or software have you used for managing outbound sales campaigns and tracking performance metrics?
How do you ensure that the leads you engage with are not recycled and are indeed relevant for booking meetings with UK business owners?
